definition: to burn/to cook/to stew/to bake/to roast/to heat/to boil (tea, water etc)/fever/to run a temperature/(coll.) to let things go to one's head

sentences.english: Once the Iso image has been created it can be burned to DVD.
sentences.chinese: 一旦ISO鏡像創建好，它就可以燒錄成DVD了。

sentences.english: Use se other flashcard's save files directly.
sentences.chinese: 可以直接拷貝使用其他燒錄卡的存檔。

sentences.english: Most of the tools that run the Honeywall reside on the CDROM itself, making it very difficult to add new features once a CDROM is burned.
sentences.chinese: 光盤上的大多數工具在光盤燒錄之後很難增加新特性。

sentences.english: Burn to CD or DVD, spanning multiple discs if necessary.
sentences.chinese: 燒錄到CD或DVD，跨越多張光碟，如果必要的。

sentences.english: Create a CD with love songs that you and your honey can enjoy.
sentences.chinese: 燒錄張CD，把你和你的寶貝都喜歡的情歌灌進去。

sentences.english: Can I burn CDS on this CD drive?
sentences.chinese: 我可以在這臺光碟機燒錄光碟嗎？

sentences.english: Use other flashcard's save files directly.
sentences.chinese: 可以直接拷貝使用其他燒錄卡的存檔。

definition: CD or DVD Drive/abbr. for 光盤驅動器|光盘驱动器
to record on a CD or DVD/to burn a disc
(Tw) tourist from mainland China/illegal immigrant from mainland China
a device used to check money and detect counterfeit bills
Pokémon or Pocket Monsters, popular Japanese video game, anime and manga
to leak/to expose (sb's secret)/to spill the beans/to let the cat out of the bag
